attributes.action: Make Menstrual Leave compulsory in all workplaces
attributes.additional_details: Some biological females have incredibly heavy periods. This can impact on concentration and efficiency due to concerns that they may be leaking. Everyone has a right to be at work without fear of embarassment. Given that this is a situation unique to biological females, the time off should be in addition to statutory annual leave.
attributes.background: I'm calling on the government to make it compulsory for biological females to have the choice to be off work whilst menstruating.
